Package deco2800.thomas.util

Class Box3D

java.lang.Object
deco2800.thomas.util.Box3D
public class Box3D
extends java.lang.Object
Representation of a box in 3d space, defined by a corner point in XYZ and extends in x (xLength), y (yLength), and z (zLength).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Box3D​(float x, float y, float z, float xLength, float yLength, float zLength)
    Constructs a new Box3D with the given corner point and dimensions.
    Box3D​(Box3D box)
    Constructs a new Box3D based on the given box.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    float distance​(Box3D o)
    Gets the diagonal distance of the Box3D.
    float getX()
    Returns the x coordinate.
    float getXLength()
    Returns the xLength (in x).
    float getY()
    Returns the y coordinate.
    float getYLength()
    Returns the yLength (in y).
    float getZ()
    Returns the z coordinate.

      Constructs a new Box3D with the given corner point and dimensions.

      y - corner point y-coordinate.
      z - corner point z-coordinate.
      xLength - xLength (in x).
      yLength - yLength (in y).
      zLength - zLength (in z).
